transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, good evening IndiaMART.
Executive: Ha, ye bataiye mera abhi tak paisa return nahi aaya.
Customer: Mai ek hafte se call kar raha hu mai subscription band karke mera paisa wapas kar diya abhi tak aaya nahi.
Executive: Sir, we do not have any refund policy.
Customer: Mai ek hafte se call kar raha hu kab tak aayega.
Executive: Sir, we do not have any refund policy. We cannot refund your amount.
Customer: Dekhiye sabse pehli baat ki Hindi mein baat kijiye aur dusra ki paisa toh wapas karega IndiaMART.
Executive: Sir, hamara refund policy hai nahi. Hamara subscription 12 mahine ka rehta hai. Aapne jo amount pay kiya hai uska subscription ek saal ke liye aap use kar sakte hai.
Customer: Aisa mujhe koi kaam hi nahi mil raha aap log fraud kar rahe ho mere sath. Toh fraud karne pe toh paisa wapas karna padega.
Executive: Sir, wali baat nahi hai IndiaMART aapko buyer deta hai.
Customer: Fraud kar rahe ho na aap log. Ek bhi aaj tak ek bhi buyer nahi aata sab aap log ka plant kiya hua buyer sab hai koi original buyer hota toh mujhse baat nahi karta maine phone kiya phone pe baat hota toh order nahi deta mujhe. Maine galti se dal diya toh maine mujhe abhi jarurat nahi hai. Just now aata hai uske baad ye sab fraud wala chakkar hai. Aisa thodi hai ki mai side jaise maine aur bhi sideon pe apna kaam kiya toh kaam hota hai ki nahi hota hai. Ye toh aap log bilkul fraud kar rahe ho fraud karne toh paisa wapas toh karoge na yaar.
Executive: Sir, hamare samne aapko buyer.
Customer: Agar agar nahi wapas karoge toh kariye ki cyber crime mein report likhwana padega aap logo ke khilaf.
Executive: Sir.
Customer: Ye kar sakta hu mai. Ek shareef aadmi aur kya karega.
Executive: Buyer de rahe hai jo hum aapko buyer de rahe hai.
Customer: Sab mujhe buyer sab aapka nakli hai sab jhoothi baatein hai koi buyer nahi hai sab aapka apna plant kiya hua.
Executive: Sir, aap bina baat kare aap bina baat kare aap feedback de rahe hai.
Customer: Sab hum khoob baat kiye hai sab aap log ka plant kiya hua buyer weer hai jab buyer hoga toh baat karega na ki ha jab usne likha ki mujhe jarurat hai 300 shirt ki toh kehta hai ki nahi maine toh galti se dal diya tha. Ye sab aap log ka banaya aap log fraud kar rahe ho mere sath mein isliye paisa wapas chahiye.
Executive: Samajh rahe ho baat ko.
Customer: Mujhe paisa wapas chahiye nahi toh cyber crime mein jaunga mai.
Executive: Sir, paisa refund nahi ho payega.
Customer: Ye crime kiya hai aap logo ne mere sath fraud karke.
Executive: Sir, abhi bhi aapki services chal rahi hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi chalu wo chalu nahi chalu se mujhe kya matlab hai maine kabhi khol ke dekha tha nahi hai ab jis din se mai paisa refund mang raha hu us din se mai kabhi khola bhi nahi hu aapki service se kya mai software bana ke dal diya service ho gayi. Kaam usme hona chahiye na paisa le rahe ho toh.
Executive: Sir, services use kare.
Customer: Koi bhi banda apna 30 40 hazar mein software bana ke dal dega kahega kaam hai kaam hai toh fraud kar rahe ho aap log hamare sath.
Executive: Sir, aapki jo.
Customer: Paisa wapas karwa do sabse behtar baat hai warna dekho aisa hai ki agar ek hafta agar do char din ke andar paisa wapas nahi hua toh mai cyber crime mein jaunga mujhe aur koi rasta nahi nazar aa raha aapke sath.
Executive: Sir, please understand hamare paas aur bhi suppliers register hai.
Customer: Wo sab sab fraud hai aapka sab bekar ki baat hai wo wahi jawab dena cyber crime mein ki supplier hai aur ye hai wo hai paisa nahi wapas karoge toh problem mein aayenge. Kyuki mai toh problem mein hu hi. Mere sath toh fraud hua hai toh mai chahunga ki dusron ke sath kam se kam na ho.
Hai na.
Mere sath ho gaya ho gaya dusre ke sath toh kam se kam nahi ho. Mai toh ye toh chahunga na.
Usko jaldi se sort out karo aap log.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received refund after subscription cancellation.

- Alleges IndiaMART is a fraud.

- Claims buyers are fake and planted.



Resolution:

- Executive stated there is no refund policy.

- Executive mentioned customer can use services for a year.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Customer threatened to report to cybercrime.



Alert (If Any):

refund, fraud, complaint, escalation

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, fraud, cyber crime
